Jogo counter-strike desde o 1.6, e o maior apelo que tenho contra esse jogo são os hackers, daqui a pouco a comunidade vai jogar só em servidores privados, tipo GC, Esportal e etc só por conta disso.

I honestly don't know what I could possibly put here that hasn't been said. The bad things are basically all true but if you are diligent and use manners then you will find people to play with that makes this game what you want it to be. Hopefully. Best FPS there is during those times.
Great game. Downside is there is a lot of hackers on nowadays because the game is free to play. You can get around that though by buying the prime badge which in reality isn't a lot of money.
Will be a 10/10, positive review once their anti cheat works
You can't avoid toxic pool... if you play too good enemies report you for cheating. if you play bad own team reports you. there is no winning in this game you always end up in toxic pool.
This game is great, you kinda need to get prime or you get vs a lot of cheaters
Sehr taktisches Spiel, macht echt mega Laune.
Те, кто договорят, что эта игра хуйня, вымерла и т.д. - враньё. Она до сих пор живёт, это просто отмазки, наверное из-за бомбежа. Игре ставлю класс, оценил, игра заебца!
I love this game its so good and amazing i mean everything is just great except the cheaters, vac sucks, smurfing is allowed, hitbox and well everything... :)
Świetna gra ze świetną fabułą i jeszcze lepszym community. Dostarcza wiele pozytywnych emocji i uspokaja jak nic innego.
1,4k godzin i gra dalej nie nudzi:)

Its kinda okay but its full of cheaters and the rankinkg system is kinda broken but otherwise its really fun to play with friends!!
Jogo muito bom, recomendo a todos
Still waiting for 128 tickrate official servers.

i have literally almost the same amount of hours that i have spent money in this game. 1 knife, lots of bad, awful teammates. solo queueing in comp is impossible, lots of toxicity, unfair lootcrates, long waiting times for matches, but the gameplay is very fun. recommended to anyone who is a complete pshychopath with good aim. 10/10
